abstract: The Air Force envisions drones that could do the work of bombers and cargo planes and miniature ones that could spy inside a room.
snippet: The Air Force envisions drones that could do the work of bombers and cargo planes and miniature ones that could spy inside a room.
lead_paragraph: Small remotely piloted planes are now used mainly to gather intelligence and fire missiles at insurgents. But over the next several decades, the Air Force envisions building larger ones that could do the work of bombers and cargo planes and even tiny ones that could spy inside a room.

headline.main: Air Force Report Envisions a Broader Use of Drones
headline.print_headline: Air Force Report Envisions A Broader Use of Drones

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
